fields.headline: What's on when
fields.bodyText: Christmas Ice Rink at Somerset House Date: December 5-January 20. Location: Somerset House, The Strand, London WC2R. Description: Spectacular skating on a 700m² open-air rink. Book early. Contact: 020-7413 3399. Email: info@somerset-house.org.uk. Link: whatsonwhen.com/events/~46247.jml. New Season Opening at La Scala Date: December 7. Location: Teatro alla Scala, Via Filodrammatici, Milan, Italy. Description: Italy's greatest opera house opens its new season with Plácido Domingo singing Otello for the last time. Contact: 0039 02 72 00 37 44. Link: whatsonwhen.com/events/~38407.jml. Presents to the Polar Bears Date: December weekends. Location: Central Park Wildlife Centre, 830 5th Avenue, Manhattan, New York 10021, US. Description: Christmas comes early for the polar bears (and snow monkeys). Contact: 001 212 861 6030. Link: wcs.org/home/zoos/centralpark. The Million Dollar Singapore Duck Race Date: December 2. Location: Singapore, Asia. Description: 100,000 or so rubber ducks are raced down the river. Contact: 0065 220 8180. Email: diakonos@mbox5.singnet.com.sg. Link: whatsonwhen.com/events/~25471.jml.
